column4: sorry for this silly question, but where is the /public_html folder (apache) in Ubuntu?
it's normally created in a users home dir
great, if you've setup mod_userdir then your sorted, if not setup mod_userdir
it should normally be enabled by default I believe
I installed apache using sudo apt-get install apache2...
But its just not pointing to the /home/jimmie32/public_html/
what do you mean it's not pointing
It shows the "It works!" page and I can't replace it...where is that page located at?
to use mod_userdir you use http://url/~$username
check out the docs on apache.org about how to use it / set it up
